google_translated: I wonder if I came to help my child

en_text: I finally got you some food.  Two of them, too.
jp_text: 久々の餌…それも2つもじゃ。
google_translated: After a long time feed ... I also have two.

en_text: The children must be happy today.
jp_text: あの子らも、今日は満足したろ
google_translated: That child is satisfied today

en_text: They could not eat.
jp_text: 喰えませ…なんだ。
google_translated: I'm sorry ... what.

en_text: It is too strong.
jp_text: あれは…手強い
google_translated: That is ...

en_text: It has come for what was taken from it.
jp_text: もや、取り戻しに来るとは
google_translated: Even if it comes to registration

en_text: I will let nothing and nobody  lay a finger on you or the children.
jp_text: いかな相手であろうとも、そなたらには指一本触れさせぬ！
google_translated: If you would be a partner, you will not touch your finger!

en_text: For my land and for my people.
jp_text: この地と…この地に生きるわが民のために
google_translated: This place ... For the people who live in this area
